#summary pSPT 3.1.2 Release

<wiki:toc max_depth="6" />

== Introduction ==

This page outlines details regarding the release of pSPT 3.1.2.  The process started in early January of 2010 and is scheduled to complete on January 29th, 2010.  

== Release Team ==

 * Jason - Lead, Development, Documentation
 * Aaron - Development, Documentation
 * Andy - Development, Documentation
 * Jeff - Development, Documentation
 * Brian - Testing
 * Maxim - Testing
 * Joe - Testing
 * Ezra - Testing
 * ...
 
== Release Schedule ==

Release Start: January 4, 2010

First Release Candidates: January 22, 2010

Beta Testing: January 22, 2010 through January 28, 2010

Release Date: January 29, 2010

== Specifics ==

The following outline some exceptions to the overall release process.  Also see [pSPSReleaseManagement] for overall recomendations on this process for the perfSONAR-PS group.

=== Code Reviews ===

=== Testing ===

Testers should download ISO betas and excersize *ALL* functionality.  If you are upgrading, note so in your testing report.  If this is a new installation, note so in your testing report.  We will need testers to represent both worlds (e.g. perhaps format a disk if applicable).
